price: ដោយពួកគេស្ថិតនៅក្នុងនោះជាអមតៈ។ ពួកគេគ្មានអ្នក គាំពារនិងគ្មានអ្នកជួយឡើយ។
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
